original_solution_mapping.L1: The total movie is 600 seconds long because 130 + 145 + 85 + 60 + 180 = <<130+145+85+60+180=600>>600
original_solution_mapping.L2: The total movie is 10 minutes long because 600 / 60 = <<600/60=10>>10
original_solution_mapping.L3: On average each player gets 2 minutes because 10 / 5 = <<10/5=2>>2

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4247.
    Returns: the average number of minutes each player gets.
    """
    # L1
    point_guard_seconds = 130 # 130 seconds of the point guard
    shooting_guard_seconds = 145 # 145 seconds of the shooting guard
    small_forward_seconds = 85 # 85 seconds of the small forward
    power_forward_seconds = 60 # 60 seconds of the power forward
    center_seconds = 180 # 180 seconds of the center
    total_movie_seconds = point_guard_seconds + shooting_guard_seconds + small_forward_seconds + power_forward_seconds + center_seconds

    # L2
    seconds_per_minute = 60 # WK
    total_movie_minutes = total_movie_seconds / seconds_per_minute

    # L3
    number_of_players = 5 # every player (5 positions listed)
    average_minutes_per_player = total_movie_minutes / number_of_players

    # FA
    answer = average_minutes_per_player
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The total movie is {total_movie_seconds} seconds long because {point_guard_seconds} + {shooting_guard_seconds} + {small_forward_seconds} + {power_forward_seconds} + {center_seconds} = <<{point_guard_seconds}+{shooting_guard_seconds}+{small_forward_seconds}+{power_forward_seconds}+{center_seconds}={total_movie_seconds}>>{total_movie_seconds}
The total movie is {total_movie_minutes} minutes long because {total_movie_seconds} / {seconds_per_minute} = <<{total_movie_seconds}/{seconds_per_minute}={total_movie_minutes}>>{total_movie_minutes}

On average each player gets {average_minutes_per_player} minutes because {total_movie_minutes} / {number_of_players} = <<{total_movie_minutes}/{number_of_players}={average_minutes_per_player}>>{average_minutes_per_player}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: The total movie is 600 seconds long because 130 + 145 + 85 + 60 + 180 = <<130+145+85+60+180=600>>600
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: The total movie is 10 minutes long because 600 / 60 = <<600/60=10>>10
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: On average each player gets 36 minutes because 180 / 5 = <<180/5=36>>36

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'center_seconds' (value: 180) was used instead of 'total_movie_minutes' (value: 10.0).
